full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,'JAM DBYANGS SPRUL BA'I GNAS MCHOG RI BO RTZE LNGA'I GNAS BSTOD DANG MGUR SOGS KYI SKOR DVANGS BSIL MDZES RGYAN NI, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @040A *, ,(CES 'JAM DBYANGS SPRUL BA'I GNAS MCHOG RI BO RTZE LNGA'I GNAS BSTOD DANG MGUR SOGS KYI SKOR DVANGS BSIL MDZES RGYAN 'DI NI RI BO RTZE LNGAR GNAS 'BREL 'JOG PA'I RMONGS BRTUL GYI NA BA YE SHES SNYING POS SKYES BU DAM PA RNAMS KYI GSUNG DANG GSUNG 'BUM LAS GANG SBYOR DANG GANG PHRANG RNAMS 'THOR DOGS DANG DAD BSKUL GYI CHED DU 'GYED PAR SMON NAS PHYOGS GCIG TU BTUS TE BSGRIGS PA YIN PAS 'DI NANG DU MA BCUG PA'I GNAS BSTOD SOGS BYUNG NA 'DI'I GRAS SU 'JUG RGYU MKHAS PA RNAMS KYIS THUGS LA 'JOG PAR ZHU, T'A MING YUNG LO RGYAL PO DANG BDE SKYID RGYAL PO GNYIS KYIS BRTZAMS PA'I RI BO RTZE LNGA'I CHE BRJOD GNYIS BOD DU BSGYUR MA BSGYUR MI SHES PAS GAL TE 'GYUR YOD NA MKHAS PA RNAMS KYIS 'DI'I NANG DU 'JUG GNANG BA MKHYEN, 'DI BRIS DGE BAS DRIN CAN PHA MA LA SOGS SEMS CAN THAMS CAD TSE RABS KUN TU BLA MA 'JAM PA'I DBYANGS KYIS RJES SU 'DZIN PA'I RGYUR 'GYUR CIG ,DGE LEGS 'PHEL GYUR CIG ,) @041A *, ,DPAR GSAR BZHENGS SKABS BSNGAGS PAR 'OS PA YI, ,GA-YUNG DGON GRA RIGS RNAM DPYOD RAB YANGS PA, ,DKA' BCU DGE SLONG DGE 'DUN MTHUN PA DANG, ,RTZIS LA RAB 'BYAMS BLO BZANG 'PHEL RGYAS DANG, , LCANG SKYA THAMS CAD MKHYEN GZIGS MDZOD GNYER PA, ,DKON MCHOG BSOD NAMS RNAMS NAS RGYU SBYAR TE, ,DPAR GYI YI GER BKOD PA SH'AKYA'I BTZUN, ,BLO BZANG TSUL KHRIMS PHUN TSOGS MTHUN PAR BRTZON, ,'DIR 'BAD DGE BAS RGYAL BSTAN DAR ZHING RGYAS, ,MAR GYUR 'GRO KUN RJE BTZUN 'JAM DBYANGS KYIS, ,RJES BZUNG SA LAM BGROD PA MTHAR PHYIN NAS, ,RNAM 'DREN GO 'PHANG MYUR DU 'THOB GYUR CIG ,(DPAR 'DI NI RI BO RTZE LNGA'I DGE BSHES DGON PA NA BZHUGS )
